summary: "The Fifth Element" is a 1997 sci-fi action movie directed by Luc Besson. Set in the 23rd century, it follows Korben Dallas (Bruce Willis), a former soldier turned taxi driver, who must save Earth from a powerful enemy. He does this by helping a young woman (Milla Jovovich) find four magical stones. The film was made in London and Mauritania because suitable locations couldn't be found in France. It received mixed reviews but was a big box office success, making over $263 million.
title: The Fifth Element
